text: DYBG (91.7 FM), broadcasting as 91.7 Ben FM, is a radio station owned and operated by Manila Broadcasting Company. Its studio is located at Brgy. Curva, Medellin, Cebu.CEBU BROADCAST STATIONS | NTC Region 7Radioman killed in Medellin road accident The station was formerly part of Radyo Natin Network from 2002 to 2018. ==References== Category:Radio stations in Cebu Category:Radio stations established in 2018
title: DYBG
